about_the_game:
Embark on a roguelike auto-battler journey in Gnaw & Order, where you command a party of resourceful rats in a world devastated by ruin. Forge powerful combinations of skills, passives, and gear to overcome challenges, and customize your party with deep systems and dynamic gameplay. Will your ingenuity be enough to conquer the chaos? Also, Collect 45+ achievements as you race through the wasteland to prove your skills!

Key Features:

  • hundreds of Skills & Passives:
    Discover skills and passives to create thousands of unique strategies tailored to your playstyle, or, use the skill combiner and see what crazy combinations you can come up with!

  • Dynamic Class System:
    Choose from multiple classes, each with three subclasses, and slot in skills and passives found during your run for ultimate versatility.

  • Equipment System with Combiner:
    Equip your rats with powerful gear and use the equipment combiner to merge items into even more potent tools.

  • Simulation Stock Market:
    Sell your unwanted items on a simulated market, where prices fluctuate—time your sales for maximum profit!

  • Unique Engine Loop Mechanic:
    Activate abilities in satisfying sequences using a tactical engine loop, rewarding clever placement and strategy.

  • Gear-Shifting Mini-Game:
    Play a fast-paced mini-game during battles to speed up your engine, giving your party an edge in critical moments.

  • Meta Upgrades:
    Unlock permanent upgrades between runs to strengthen your party and expand your strategic options.

  • Elite Enemies:
    Face off against powerful foes with unique mechanics that test your skills and creativity. Collect their logs to read up on the games lore and unlock permanent bonuses!

Adapt to a harsh world with cunning strategies and clever resourcefulness. Every run is a fresh opportunity to rise above the ashes and lead your ratpack to triumph!

name: Gnaw & Order

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Lead a party of rats through a post-apocalyptic world in this roguelike auto-battler. Master hundreds of unique skills and passives, explore deep class customization and utilize the engine loop to activate abilities in satisfying sequences. Adapt, survive, and thrive!
